players.name: Diogo Jota
summaries: Sam Bonfield mentions that Jota is a great option and feels he could score well in upcoming games.
Julien Laurens agrees that Jota looked impressive and is worth having in teams.

players.name: Erling Haaland
summaries: Sam Bonfield suggests that Haaland is the obvious choice for captaincy this week due to his form and fixture.
Julien Laurens agrees but mentions it's early in the season for a triple captaincy.

players.name: Pedro Porro
summaries: Sam Bonfield expresses concern over Porro's injury status and discusses his attacking potential if he plays.
Julien Laurens notes that Porro had good attacking returns.

players.name: Isak
summaries: Sam Bonfield believes Isak could be a good captaincy option against Bournemouth in the next fixtures.
Julien Laurens agrees but cautions about Newcastle's overall performance.

players.name: Garnacho
summaries: Julien Laurens discusses Garnacho coming off the bench and contributing, indicating that he will start going forward.
Kelly Somers expresses surprise at his return and suggests he is a valuable FPL asset.

players.name: Danny Welbeck
summaries: Sam Bonfield highlights Welbeck's outstanding performance and potential as a budget option.
Julien Laurens also emphasizes his surprise at Welbeck's effective play, suggesting he could be a valuable differential.

players.name: Kai Havertz
summaries: Sam Bonfield acknowledges Havertz's strong performance in his first game and sees potential for future games.
Julien Laurens agrees with Bonfield about Havertz’s strong start.

players.name: Mohamed Salah
summaries: Julien Laurens discusses Salah's performance and fears not having him in their teams, suggesting he's a must-have.
Sam Bonfield concurs and emphasizes that captaining Salah is also a wise choice given Liverpool's fixtures.

players.name: Jamie Vardy
summaries: Julien Laurens suggests Vardy as a differential this week after a successful first game.
Sam Bonfield expresses surprise at Vardy’s performance and potential but notes the overall risk.

players.name: Phil Foden
summaries: Sam Bonfield raises Foden as a potential captaincy choice if managers do not have Haaland.
Julien Laurens agrees and discusses the improvement expected from Foden as the season progresses.

players.name: Cole Palmer
summaries: Sam Bonfield mentions that Palmer is a player to consider but expresses concerns regarding his recent performances.
Julien Laurens concurs, suggesting managers might transfer him out for better options.

players.name: Bukayo Saka
summaries: Julien Laurens mentions Saka as a potential captaincy choice against Aston Villa due to his form.
Sam Bonfield expresses confidence in Saka being a strong option this weekend.
